name: Shoot And Chute
description:
It's a shooter, it's a puzzle game, it's both!? Some wires are cross at this arcade as the two games joined together playing two games at the same time!

Play as Shoot, a crack shot cosmonaut sent to the deepest quadrants of space to deal with stubborn scourge of shaped creatures among the stars. Blast those beasts, pick up power-ups and Shoot for the stars!

AND

Play as Chute, the mouse mechanic managing the mayhem of problematic pipes pumping up the pressure.  Match four to clean up the clutter before it's all sent down the Chute!

Both of these games are linked together, annihilating an alien adds pieces to place for Chute and crushing the clutter creates collectable power-ups for Shoot.

Controls:

  • Arrows/WASD = Move
  • Space = Shoot / Rotate Piece
  • Tab = Switch Game
  • Enter = Pause Game
  • Escape = Close Game
